text: “Ha! Inu ndinu amene muwakonda (adani anu) pomwe iwo sakukondani ngakhale inu mukukhulupirira mabuku onse! Akakumana nanu amanena (mwachiphamaso): “Takhulupirira.” Koma akakhala kwa okha, amakulumirani nsonga za zala chifukwa chaukali. Nena: “Mwalirani ndiukali wanuwo ndithudi, Allah akudziwa za m’zifuwa (mwanu).”
